analysis.title: Global Market Outlook
analysis.content: GMS Status: 37 (Defensive). Current momentum pushed the score to 37, reflecting a cautious regime. While VIX (Fear/Volatility) rising to 21.11 signals risk-off, the lower-than-expected 2.4% CPI (Inflation) acts as a potential catalyst for recovery. DXY (Dollar/Liquidity) remains stable, but global equity weakness suggests staying defensive. Focus on capital preservation until VIX stabilizes despite the cooling inflation narrative.

reports.EN: GMS Status: 37 (Defensive). Current momentum pushed the score to 37, reflecting a cautious regime. While VIX (Fear/Volatility) rising to 21.11 signals risk-off, the lower-than-expected 2.4% CPI (Inflation) acts as a potential catalyst for recovery. DXY (Dollar/Liquidity) remains stable, but global equity weakness suggests staying defensive. Focus on capital preservation until VIX stabilizes despite the cooling inflation narrative.

El DXY (DÃ³lar/Liquidez) estÃ¡ estable, pero la debilidad global sugiere mantener una postura defensiva. Priorice la preservaciÃ³n de capital hasta que el VIX se estabilice.

reports.ID: Status GMS: 37 (Defensif). Momentum saat ini mendorong skor ke 37, menunjukkan rezim waspada. Meskipun VIX (Ketakutan/Volatilitas) naik ke 21,11 menandakan penghindaran risiko, angka CPI (Inflasi) 2,4% yang lebih rendah dari perkiraan menjadi katalis pemulihan. DXY (Kekuatan Dolar/Likuiditas) stabil, namun pelemahan saham global menyarankan sikap defensif. Fokus pada pelestarian modal hingga VIX mereda meskipun narasi inflasi mulai mendingin.

reports.DE: GMS-Status: 37 (Defensiv). Das aktuelle Momentum hielt den Score bei 37, was auf ein vorsichtiges Marktumfeld hindeutet. WÃ¤hrend der VIX (Angst/VolatilitÃ¤t) auf 21,11 stieg und Risikoscheu signalisiert, bietet die niedriger als erwartete Inflation (CPI 2,4%) eine Chance auf Erholung. Der DXY (Dollar/LiquiditÃ¤t) bleibt stabil, doch die globale SchwÃ¤che mahnt zur Defensivstrategie. Fokus auf Kapitalerhalt, bis die VolatilitÃ¤t trotz sinkender Teuerungsraten nachlÃ¤sst.
reports.FR: Statut GMS : 37 (DÃ©fensif). L'Ã©lan actuel a maintenu le score Ã  37, reflÃ©tant une phase de prudence. Alors que le VIX (Peur/VolatilitÃ©) monte Ã  21,11, signalant une aversion au risque, l'IPC (Inflation) de 2,4 % infÃ©rieur aux attentes offre un espoir de rebond. Le DXY (Dollar/LiquiditÃ©) est stable, mais la faiblesse des marchÃ©s mondiaux impose une posture dÃ©fensive. PrivilÃ©giez la protection du capital en attendant que la volatilitÃ© se stabilise durablement.
